resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>41526db6-e728-422f-2c33-71b8f51bf784#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Urartui trónmakett</string>
            <string language="en">Urartu's throne mock-up</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mock-up Thron Urartus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maquette du trône d'Urartu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Giga do throne de Urartu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modello del throne del Urartu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρότυπο θρόνων Urartu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Maqueta del trono de Urartu</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Történelmi és bibliai személyeket ahhoz a képhez rendelni, amelyiken szerepelnek (képek: Cranach:Salome, Szt. Katalin, Altdorfer: Nagy Sándor csatája, Holbein: VIII. Henrik, Dániai Krisztina, Morus Tamás</string>
            <string language="en">Historical and biblical people are assigne to that picture, which appear on. (pictures: Cranach: Salome, Saint Catharine, Altdorfer: Battle of Alexander the Great, Holberin: Henrik VIII., Christina of Denmark, Morus Thomas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">id. Lucas Cranach,  15.század,  Salome,  Szent Katalin,  Albrecht Altdorfer,  dunai iskola,  Holbein, Hans, ifj.,  </string>
            <string language="en">Lucas Cranach the Elder,  15.century, Salome,  Saint Catharine, Albrecht Altdorfer,  Danubian School, Holbein, Hans, the Young</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Historische und biblische Leute sind assigne zu 
dieser Abbildung, die an erscheinen (Abbildungen: Cranach: 
Salome, Heiliger Catharine, Altdorfer: Schlacht von 
Alexander das große, Holberin: Henrik VIII., Christina von 
Dänemark, Morus Thomas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les personnes historiques et bibliques sont 
assigne à cette image, qui apparaissent en fonction (des images : 
Cranach : Salome, Saint Catharine, Altdorfer : 
Bataille d'Alexandre le grand, Holberin : Henrik VIII., 
Christina du Danemark, Morus Thomas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os povos históricos e biblical são assigne a 
esse retrato, que aparecem sobre (retratos: Cranach: 
Salome, Saint Catharine, Altdorfer: Batalha de Alexander o
grande, Holberin: Henrik VIII., Christina de Dinamarca, Morus 
Thomas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La gente storica e biblica è assigne a 
quell'immagine, che compaiono sopra (immagini: Cranach: 
Salome, San Catharine, Altdorfer: Battaglia di Alexander 
il grande, Holberin: Henrik VIII., Christina della Danimarca, 
Morus Thomas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ιστορικοί και βιβλικοί άνθρωποι είναι assigne σε
εκείνη την εικόνα, οι οποίοι εμφανίζονται επάνω (εικόνες: 
Cranach: Salome, Αγιος Catharine, Altdorfer: μάχη του 
Αλεξάνδρου ο μεγάλος, Holberin: Henrik VIII., Χριστίνα της
Δανίας, Morus Thomas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La gente histórica y bíblica es assigne a ese 
cuadro, que aparecen encendido (los cuadros: Cranach: 
Salome, Santo Catharine, Altdorfer: Batalla de Alexander 
el grande, Holberin: Henrik VIII., Christina de Dinamarca, Morus
Thomas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lucas Cranach das Älteste, 15.century, Salome, 
Heiliger Catharine, Albrecht Altdorfer, Danubian Schule, Holbein, 
Hans, die Junge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lucas Cranach l'aîné, 15.century, Salome, Saint 
Catharine, Albrecht Altdorfer, école de Danubian, Holbein, 
Hans, le jeune</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lucas Cranach a pessoa idosa, 15.century, Salome, Saint
Catharine, Albrecht Altdorfer, escola de Danubian, Holbein, Hans, o 
jovem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lucas Cranach il elder, 15.century, Salome, San 
Catharine, Albrecht Altdorfer, scuola di Danubian, Holbein, Hans, il 
giovane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Λuθας Cranach ο παλαιότερος, 15.century, Salome, 
Αγιος Catharine, Albrecht Altdorfer, δουνάβιο σχολείο, 
Holbein, hans, οι νεολαίες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lucas Cranach la anciano, 15.century, Salome, Santo 
Catharine, Albrecht Altdorfer, escuela de Danubian, Holbein, Hans, el 
joven</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
